pre-make:
printf $'##############
# Works on hosts Linux
# 

#########################
# Check the host platform

HOST_PLATFORM = linux
ifeq ($(shell uname -a),)
  HOST_PLATFORM = windows
else ifneq ($(findstring MINGW,$(shell uname -a)),)
  HOST_PLATFORM = windows
else ifneq ($(findstring Darwin,$(shell uname -a)),)
  HOST_PLATFORM = darwin
else ifneq ($(findstring win,$(shell uname -a)),)
  HOST_PLATFORM = windows
endif

#########################
# Set the target platform

TARGET_PLATFORM = linux_aarch64

#################
# Toolchain setup

# For cross-compilation, use the aarch64 toolchain. On native aarch64 systems, the default gcc might be sufficient.
CC  = aarch64-linux-gnu-gcc
CXX = aarch64-linux-gnu-g++
AS  = aarch64-linux-gnu-as
AR  = aarch64-linux-gnu-ar

############
# Extensions

OBJEXT = .linux_aarch64.o
SOEXT  = .linux_aarch64.so
LIBEXT = .linux_aarch64.a

################
# Platform setup

STATIC_LINKING = 0
platform       = unix
PLATDEFS       =
PLATCFLAGS     = -march=armv8-a -fpic -fstrict-aliasing
PLATCXXFLAGS   = -march=armv8-a -fpic -fstrict-aliasing
PLATLDFLAGS    = -march=armv8-a -shared -lm -Wl,-version-script=$(BUILD_DIR)/link.T -Wl,-no-undefined
PLATLDXFLAGS   = -march=armv8-a -shared -lm -Wl,-version-script=$(BUILD_DIR)/link.T -Wl,-no-undefined

################
# libretro setup

RETRODEFS     = -D__LIBRETRO__
RETROCFLAGS   =
RETROCXXFLAGS =
RETROLDFLAGS  =
RETROLDXFLAGS =

#################
# Final variables

DEFINES  = $(PLATDEFS) $(RETRODEFS)
CFLAGS   = $(PLATCFLAGS) $(RETROCFLAGS) $(DEFINES) $(INCLUDES)
CXXFLAGS = $(PLATCXXFLAGS) $(RETROCXXFLAGS) $(DEFINES) $(INCLUDES)
LDFLAGS  = $(PLATLDFLAGS) $(RETROLDFLAGS)
LDXFLAGS = $(PLATLDXFLAGS) $(RETROLDXFLAGS)

########
# Tuning

ifneq ($(DEBUG),)
  CFLAGS   += -O0 -g
  CXXFLAGS += -O0 -g
else
  CFLAGS   += -O3 -DNDEBUG
  CXXFLAGS += -O3 -DNDEBUG
endif

ifneq ($(LOG_PERFORMANCE),)
  CFLAGS   += -DLOG_PERFORMANCE
  CXXFLAGS += -DLOG_PERFORMANCE
endif

####################################
# Variable setup for Makefile.common

CORE_DIR  ?= ..
BUILD_DIR ?= .
INCLUDES   =

include $(BUILD_DIR)/Makefile.common

###############
# Include rules

include $(BUILD_DIR)/Makefile.rules
' > Makefile.aarch64

printf $'##############
